A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: AS a Star Wars fan since the original came out I struggled with this movie immensely. I am not sure if it was the film or my expectations.  I had so many theories and was hopeful for answers.  Sadly this movie provided none.  I Have been a fan of Luke for some time and was shocked by the portrayal of  of this iconic figure.  I get him going into hiding\, but questioning the legitimacy of the Jedi order as a whole was difficult.  There are no answers in this film\, none\, and the ones that are provided were a vast let down.  I wanted to love this film and after seeing it a second time\, feel worse.  It's worth the money to see but may leave you feeling empty.
